statements.query: MATCH (n:GCPVpc) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP VPCs that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPVpc)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP VPC-to-Project relationships that are out of date.

statements.query: MATCH (:GCPInstance)-[r:MEMBER_OF_GCP_VPC]->(:GCPVpc) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP Instance-to-VPC relationships that are out of date.
